item.title: Class of Heroes 1 2 3 Remaster Collection announced for PS5, Switch
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/class-of-heroes-1-2-3-remaster-collection-announced-for-ps5-switch

  • PS5
  • Switch

Due out on September 18 in Japan.

ACQUIRE has announced Class of Heroes 1 2 3 Remaster Collection, a physical collection including Class of Heroes: Anniversary Edition, Class of Heroes 2G: Remaster Edition, and Class of Heroes 3: Remaster. It will launch for PlayStation 5 and Switch on September 18 in Japan for 6,980 yen.

In addition to the standard edition, a 9,980 yen limited edition will also be available, which includes a yearbook-style box, the art book “TOTOMONO Daizensyu” previously only available as a pre-order bonus, a re-edited version of the “TOTOMONO3 Visual Book” released at Comic Market 78, and a soundtrack CD with a carefully curated collection of tracks from all three games.

In the west, both Class of Heroes: Anniversary Edition and Class of Heroes 2G: Remaster Edition are already available for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam, including the physical bundle Class of Heroes 1 & 2: Complete Edition for PlayStation 5 and Switch, and Class of Heroes 3: Remaster is due out both physically and digitally in 2025.

Visit the official website here.

item.title: Tokyo Underground Killer adds PS5 and Xbox Series versions, launches in Q3 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/tokyo-underground-killer-adds-ps5-and-xbox-series-versions-launches-in-q3-2025

First-person action game Tokyo Underground Killer will be available for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series alongside its previously announced PC (Steam) version in Q3 2025, developer Phoenix Game Productions announced. A demo is available now for PC as part of Steam Next Fest: June 2025 Edition.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Neon-infused katana action in a fever dream Tokyo!

Dive into Tokyo’s criminal underground as the feared “Shinjuku Vampire” Kobayashi and take out crazy lunatics for just the right price.

Key Features

  • Unrelenting Katana Combat – Slash, stab and parry your way through hordes of monsters inspired by Japanese demons.
  • Blood is the Key to Survival – Use 10 different blood skills to overcome challenging enemies, then suck in their blood to replenish your health and skills.
  • Fever Dream Tokyo – Explore neon-drenched renditions of real places like Shinjuku, Akihabara or Shibuya.
  • Enjoy Tokyo’s Nightlife – Between missions you can relax in your own apartment in Shinjuku, buy decorations and play minigames in the city hub.
  • Become Unstoppable – Upgrade your ability tree to become stronger and unlock new abilities.
  • Hand-Drawn Comic – A bizarre story with crazy characters brought to live in dynamic comic scenes drawn by Hans “Heavy Metal Hanzo” Steinbach.
  • Thanks, Andrew – Over two hours of original electronic music composed by the legendary Andrew Hulshult.

item.title: 4X strategy game Revival: Recolonization coming to Xbox Series, Xbox One on June 16
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/4x-strategy-game-revival-recolonization-coming-to-xbox-series-xbox-one-on-june-16

  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for PC.

HeroCraft PC will release post-apocalyptic 4X strategy game Revival: Recolonization for Xbox Series and Xbox One on June 16 for $29.99, the company announced. Pre-orders are available at a discount price of $23.99.

Revival: Recolonization first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on June 28, 2023, followed by a full release on April 11, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via HeroCraft:

About

Set in a post-apocalyptic version of Earth, Revival: Recolonization is a 4X strategy game where the world and its rules can change at key moments, creating a deep and highly replayable experience. Explore a transformed planet, negotiate or conquer new territories and bring the light of civilization to regressing human colonies in order to prepare mankind for war with a despotic entity.

Key Features

  • Enjoy an Unprecedented Level of Freedom – Revival: Recolonization generates a vast possibility space for you to play around with. From sudden weather changes to zombie infestations and bans on certain weapon types—boy, you are in for a surprise. ​Adapt to new conditions with the help of the nuanced edict system that allows you to terraform the planet and fine-tune the game rules on specific regions of the map. Protect your settlement from changes by building special shield constructs or by accepting the blessings of your tribe’s totem tree.
  • Progress Through the Ages – Survivors of the terrible catastrophe that almost destroyed mankind have unique traits and bonuses that affect your gameplay style. Pick the right clan to take under your wing and help your followers evolve through four distinct epochs, all the way to futuristic settlements and breakthrough technology.
  • Engage in Tactical Combat – Command an army that is suited to your play style by gearing up troops with a variety of components, which can also be crafted. Adapt your tactics in intense turn-based battles by mixing and matching different parts, as well as smartly using destructible cover to defeat your enemies.
  • Explore Earth After a Devastating Cataclysm – Revival: Recolonization takes place on our own home planet whose landscape and climate have been dramatically transformed. Discover pre-cataclysm artifacts and anomalies with unexpected behaviors. Face off against wild beasts that have evolved to survive in these conditions, as well as fearsome mechanical automatons that roam the lands.
